snippet.title: Wonder Wand - Early game play
snippet.description:
First gameplay video of the Zelda-like puzzle adventure game, Wonder Wand. Please note that the game is still in development, so the gameplay and visuals, including placeholder art, are not final.

👉 Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2282340/Wonder_Wand/
Wishlisting the game = ❤️. Your wishlist add helps Steam algorithms boost its visibility and makes my day!

👉 Discord server: https://discord.com/invite/pjK2ayFgm9
Join our Discord server for unofficial builds and the chance to follow and influence development. All ideas and feedback are welcome.
